page.title: 02Recreational Sport
page.content: Sport facilities are limited in Cromford - to the{Meadows}(various pitches) and the{Community Centre -Indoor Sports. Most sports in Cromford are for both sexes but others are limited to either boys or girls. The most popular sport in Cromford is probably{football.}One of the most enjoyable sports is{fishing}on the River Derwent.It is very relaxing and is fun.Open spaces and natural features mean people do{rock climbing {(Willersley, Black}Rocks){canoeing {(River Derwent), cycling,jogging}and walking anywhere.But lots of interesting countryside. The hardest sports in Cromford are{karate, boxing {and{rugby.
